name: Sunny Yellow
description: The vibrant, sunny yellow represents the cheerful and lively atmosphere of Spain, known for its warm weather, festivals, and vibrant culture.

name: Grass Green
description: The lush grass green is a nod to the emerald landscapes of Ireland, famous for its rolling green hills, meadows, and picturesque countryside.

name: Sky Blue
description: This color symbolizes the clear, captivating blue skies of Greece, a country blessed with beautiful weather and stunning coastal views.

name: Sea Wave
description: The sea wave color reflects the deep blue waters surrounding Italy, particularly the Mediterranean Sea, highlighting the country's extensive coastline.

name: Sandy Beige
description: Inspired by the sandy beaches of Egypt, this color evokes the warm, golden hues of the desert and the famous beaches along the Red Sea.

name: Pink Sunset
description: The pink sunset color captures the mesmerizing hues of the Indian sky during sunset, painting a picture of tranquility and spirituality.

name: Crimson Rose
description: The crimson rose color represents the flower fields of the Netherlands, especially the iconic tulip fields, adding a touch of vibrant beauty.

name: Purple Lavender
description: Inspired by the lavender fields of Provence, France, this purple shade reflects the charm and aroma of the picturesque landscapes.

name: Mountain Gray
description: The mountain gray color is a nod to the rugged and majestic gray rocks of the Swiss Alps, depicting the country's stunning alpine scenery.

name: Bright Orange
description: Reflecting the tropical forests of Brazil, the bright orange symbolizes the vibrant flora and fauna found in the diverse ecosystems of the country.

name: Silvery Gray
description: Silvery gray represents the unique landscapes of Iceland, characterized by glaciers, volcanic rocks, and ethereal silvery vistas under the moonlight.

name: Blue Glacier
description: This shade reflects the icy blue hues of Icelandic glaciers, highlighting the country's stunning glacial formations.

name: Golden Desert
description: The golden desert color captures the warm and enchanting tones of Morocco's vast Sahara Desert, known for its golden dunes.

name: Emerald Green
description: Inspired by the lush greenery of New Zealand, this emerald green represents the country's breathtaking landscapes, including rolling hills and dense forests.

name: Ruby Red
description: Symbolizing good fortune in Chinese culture, ruby red represents the rich cultural heritage and prosperity of China.

name: Sapphire Blue
description: The sapphire blue color is reminiscent of the crystal-clear blue waters surrounding the stunning beaches of Thailand.

name: Copper Canyon
description: Inspired by the copper-colored canyons of Mexico, this hue reflects the warm and earthy tones of the country's diverse landscapes.

name: Olive Grove
description: The olive grove color represents the iconic olive trees that dot the Greek countryside, symbolizing peace and abundance.

name: Pearl White
description: Antarctica's vast icy landscapes are captured by the pearl white color, representing the pristine and untouched beauty of the continent.

name: Terracotta
description: Inspired by the terracotta landscapes of Cappadocia, Turkey, this color reflects the unique rock formations and warm tones of the region.

name: Violet Orchid
description: The violet orchid color is a tribute to the elegant and symbolic orchids found in Japanese gardens, representing beauty and grace.

name: Coral Pink
description: This color reflects the coral pink hues found in the Great Barrier Reef, showcasing the natural beauty of Australia's underwater ecosystems.

name: Arctic Blue
description: The arctic blue represents the cool and crisp blue tones of Norway's Arctic landscapes, including its glaciers and fjords.

name: Lavender Mist
description: Inspired by the lavender mist that can be found in South African landscapes, this color captures the serene and tranquil essence of the region.

name: Turquoise Lagoon
description: The turquoise lagoon color reflects the crystal-clear turquoise waters of the Maldives, portraying the idyllic and tropical paradise of the islands.

name: Ebony Black
description: Ebony black symbolizes the rich and dark soils of the Kenyan savannah, home to diverse wildlife and iconic landscapes.

name: Cherry Blossom Pink
description: This color represents the soft and delicate pink hues of cherry blossoms that bloom in South Korea during the spring season, symbolizing renewal and beauty.

name: Platinum Silver
description: Inspired by the silver landscapes of the Russian tundra, this color captures the cool and reflective beauty of the country's northern regions.

name: Tangerine Orange
description: The tangerine orange color symbolizes the warm and vibrant tones found in the Grand Canyon, one of the USA's most iconic natural

name: Fiery Red
description: his fiery red is reminiscent of the spectacular autumn foliage in Canada, where maple leaves turn vibrant shades of red during the fall season.
